name: Junta! Police State 1981
description:
The year is 1981. After a military coup, you are a junior officer in the army tasked with maintaining law and order in the capital.

How to play

Patrol the city to maintain the stability of the junta.

Complete supply drop missions to sustain the government.

Disperse protests with your water cannon.

Avoid harming civilians!

Controls:
  • W & S: Accelerate & brake
  • A & D: Steering
  • R: Reset vehicle (if stuck)
  • Mouse to aim water cannon.
  • Left click to fire
